trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Chesaning
There were no other sightings in Chesaning on or around June 30th 1963
divs: Sighting DetailsI was very young at the time, 8 or 9 years old. It was summer time just after dusk. I was playing outside when I saw a phosflourescent blue light moving slowly north to south in the sky. It was silent, moving very slowly. I could see the farm house image about a half mile away to the west. It was about half the distance to the farm house and slightly above. I was mesmerized, just staring at it for about 4-5 minutes. It suddenly stopped and stayed in one position. An older neighbor came up to me and asked me what I was doing. All I could think of that could move thru the sky and then stop and stay motionless was a helicoptor. I pointed to the blue light and told him it was a helicoptor. He said it was a star. I was distracted and when I looked up it was gone. Even at 8-9 years old I knew that it wasnt a helicoptor. Since that day I have been extremely observent, open minded and investigative of phenomena.
Summary: phosflourescence blue round object in sky
